node_types.label: NetworkNode
node_types.description: Represents a node in the network, such as a gNB or UE.

node_types.label: ProtocolMessage
node_types.description: Represents a message exchanged between network nodes.

node_types.label: Timer
node_types.description: Represents a time-based event or process.

node_types.label: Procedure
node_types.description: Represents a sequence of steps or actions.

node_types.label: UserState
node_types.description: Represents the current state of a user, such as RRC_IDLE or RRC_INACTIVE.
